About.paragraph1: Versatech Management Solution is a premier provider of specialized consultancy services, dedicated to enhancing organizational performance through strategic document control, project governance, and process optimization. We partner with clients across industries to deliver tailored solutions that drive compliance, operational efficiency, and long-term success.
About.paragraph2: With a deep understanding of complex project environments and regulatory landscapes, our team brings a wealth of experience in implementing best-in-class practices that align with international standards and client-specific requirements. Our consultancy is built on a foundation of integrity, precision, and continuous improvement.
About.philosophy: At Versatech Management Consultancy, we believe that excellence in organizational performance begins with precision, integrity, and innovation. Our philosophy centers on empowering businesses to thrive through strategic document control, quality management, and sustainable digital transformation. We are committed to fostering a culture of continuous improvement, where compliance is not just a requirement but a pathway to resilience and long-term success. By aligning our practices with international standards and tailoring solutions to each clientâ€™s unique environment, we ensure that every engagement delivers measurable value, operational clarity, and enduring impact.

MissionVision.title: Mission
MissionVision.text: To empower organizations by delivering expert consultancy in document control management, project governance, and process optimization, while fostering a culture of quality, compliance, and continuous improvement. We educate and guide companies in adopting digital solutions and sustainable practices, promoting a paperless environment that aligns with global green initiatives. Through tailored strategies and adherence to international standards, we help clients enhance operational efficiency, ensure regulatory compliance, and build resilient systems that support long-term success.

MissionVision.title: Vision
MissionVision.text: To be the leading global consultancy recognized for transforming organizational performance through innovative, standards-aligned solutions in document control, project governance, and quality management. We envision a future where organizations thrive in complex project environments by embracing digital transformation, sustainable practices, and robust document control frameworks that ensure compliance, transparency, and operational excellence.

Services.name: Strategy & Framework Development
Services.text2: Define taxonomy, metadata standards, and retention policies

Services.name: System Design & Implementation
Services.text1: Configure document management platforms(e.g. Aconex, Procore, SharePoint, Google Workspace)
Services.text2: Set up access controls, versioning, and automation workflows

Services.name: Training & Change Management
Services.text2: Provide user manuals and onboarding support

Services.name: Subscription & Retainer Options
Services.text1: Flexible monthly plans for ongoing consultancy and support
Services.text2: Tiered packages to suit different organization sizes and needs

Team.name: Zawani Binti Ag Hashim
Team.summary: Experienced and detail-oriented Document Control Manager with over a decade of expertise in managing corporate and project documentation across construction and oil & gas industries. Proficient in implementing and overseeing document control systems (Aconex, Procore, SharePoint), ensuring compliance with quality standards, and leading teams to deliver efficient document workflows. Recognized for strong leadership, process optimization, and commitment to project success.

Contact.address: SA-M4-07, BLOCK M ANJUNG B, JALAN KP1/6, 43300 SERI KEMBANGAN, SELANGOR
